newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Bank, airline help Mauritius bourse edge higher.
newsitem.headline: Bank, airline help Mauritius bourse edge higher.

text.p: Mauritius Commercial Bank and Air Mauritius stocks helped the Mauritius Stock Exchange SEMDEX share index edge up 0.29 points on Friday to 380.56, brokers said.
Turnover stood at 2.50 million rupees on 84,300 shares from 2.97 million rupees on 146,940 shares on last Wednesday.
"There is still a wait-and-see attitude," a broker said.
Mauritius Commercial Bank gained 50 cents to 89.00 rupees on 5,593 shares with State Bank of Mauritius stable at 12.00 rupees but not quoted.
National carrier Air Mauritius was 1.00 higher at 37.30 rupees on 29,305 shares.
In the insurance sector, Swan lost 70 cents to 47.60 rupees on 2,538 shares and British American Insurance was unchanged at 9.00 rupees on 4,350 shares.

Hotel-based Sun Resorts was stable at 50.00 rupees, but was not quoted. New Mauritius Hotels was unchanged at 37.20 rupees on 788 shares and Grand Baie Hotel was unchanged at 49.00 rupees on 270 shares.
Conglomerate Ireland Blyth was stable at 16.20 rupees and unquoted with Rogers unchanged at 96.00 rupees on 500 shares.
In the investment sector, Mauritius Development Investment Trust rose 10 cents to 7.30 rupees on 12,221 shares and Policy gained five cents to 4.05 rupees on 7,722 shares.
